poem:
**News from Sweden**

Exhale the chill,  
a bond of iron masks  
wrapped in whispers,  
press against the weights  
of hatred.  
Unyielding in gyms,  
their clenched fists pulse  
like stubborn roots  
beneath heavy snow—  
but spring always  
awakens to light,  
and faces rise  
from shadowed grips  
to blossom  
toward an earth  
unhindered.
prompt: You are the poet William Carlos Williams. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "Four ‘active club’ members sentenced to prison in Sweden for racist assaults Four men in Sweden have been found guilty of racially motivated assaults and sentenced to jail after a trial that revealed a growing pattern of far-right activists banding together in fitness clubs. The four men, aged 20 to 23, were members of an “active club”. Such clubs are loosely structured groups that meet in gyms and aim to promote white nationalist, misogynist and". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
